Huawei P9 lite VNS-L31

Unlocking

This device can be unlocked with Chimeratool and FuriousGold Flycaptain module

  1. Boot the device as normal and skip through startup wizard
  2. Open the dialler and enter *#*#2846579#*#*
  3. Select Background Settings
  4. Select USB Port settings
  5. Select Manufacture Mode and tap close
  6. Connect to PC with a micro USB cable
  7. (Furious Gold only) Press detect phone, Chimeratool will autodetect
  8. Press Unlock to remove sim locks

Flashing

  1. Copy the dload folder from the device folder to the root of a micro SD card (minimum size 4Gb)
  2. Ensure the device has at least 30% battery, Please note this update will erase userdata
  3. Insert the Micro SD card into the devices SD card slot within the sim tray
  4. Boot the device and skip through all startup wizard steps
  5. Open the dialler and enter *#*#2846579#*#*
  6. Select Software Upgrade
  7. Select SDCard Upgrade
  8. At the “Are you sure?” prompt tap OK
  9. The device will now reboot into recovery mode and install the software update
  10. Once complete the device will reboot
